name: Risk Foundation
goal: The “Fondation du Risque“  (FDR) was created in 2007 by four academic institutions (the Centre Economique des Actuaires, l’Ecole Polytechnique, l’ENSAE and l’Université Paris-Dauphine) and four financial institutions (Allianz (ex AGF), Axa, Groupama and Société Générale). The foundation enables longer research projects that in a sustainable way supports the development of excellent French research in all areas connected to risk.
interests: Agriculture, Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation
